title: Fix TestRejectCommand tests - add required feedback argument
description:
Multiple tests in TestRejectCommand are failing because they call `tk reject <id> --json` without providing a feedback message.

Since commit that made feedback mandatory for reject, 9 tests fail:
- reject_awaiting_approval_returns_to_agent (line 597)
- reject_awaiting_review_returns_to_agent (line 641)  
- reject_awaiting_content_returns_to_agent (line 676)
- reject_awaiting_work_returns_to_agent (line 711)
- reject_awaiting_input_closes_tick (line 747)
- reject_awaiting_escalation_closes_tick (line 789)
- reject_awaiting_checkpoint_returns_to_agent (line 831)
- reject_manual_tick_returns_to_agent (line 906)
- reject_with_json_output (line 943)

**Fix:** Update each test to include a feedback argument, e.g.:
```go
run([]string{"tk", "reject", id, "Test feedback", "--json"})
```

**File:** cmd/tk/main_test.go
**Implementation:** cmd/tk/main.go:2500-2503 requires feedback
